name: Script.openelec.rpi.config
tagline: Unofficial Raspberry Pi configuration add-on for OpenELEC
body:
## Installation
=============================

Install my XBMC repository from [xbmc.repo.leopold.zip](http://bit.ly/1gorQQG). Then install **OpenELEC RPi Config** from **Leopold's Add-ons** under **Program Add-ons**.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
